titleStmt.title: The principle of all principles concerning religion. Or The summe of certaine sermons prooving the scriptures to be the very VVord of God.
titleStmt.author: Byfield, Adoniram, d. 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by I. D[awson] for Nicholas Bourne, at the south entrance of the Royall Exchange,
